main.name: Ryan Vickramasinghe
main.description: I'll be graduating in April 2022, and am looking for full-time opportunities anywhere that gives me the chance to build things, solve problems, and continue learning!
main.bio: I've got over 2 years of work experience within large organizations, using technologies such as Java, ReactJS, AWS, NoSQL, and more! Apart from all that, I'm a massive lover of the outdoors; on weekends you can find me hiking a mountain. I'm also passionate about music, and play piano myself.
main.contactmessage: NOTE: The form below does not work yet! Please email me at: rvickram@uwo.ca

resume.skillmessage: Some of my skills and how proficient I am with each.

education.description: Professional Internship Option, Intramural Sports Captain, Western Formula One SAE Member, Western AI Club Member

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked on the Datapath Efficiency team. Datapath is a foundational platform that is core to Amazon's eCommerce business. It is comprised of highly scalable distributed systems that execute business logic, authored by teams across Amazon, millions of times per second in real-time. Worked on a benchmarking platform allowing millions to be saved annually.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Involved in design and implementation of an enterprise-wide data catalogue, which aggregates and presents available data.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Designed and implemented a system which would reconcile various risk ledgers using graph technology, processing millions of data points. Researched and designed a data model which improved performance by over 60%. Created an application which allowed users to graphically build complex graph queries to retrieve data from the system.

projects.title: Movie Recommender
projects.category: A Python-based IMDb scraper and movie recommender.

projects.title: Chat Client
projects.category: A React-based Chat client, along with a NodeJS-based messaging API.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Ryan Vickramasinghe must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
